languages.text: "Конечно, сколько угодно". {n}Мастер Печатей протягивает чистый свиток.{/n} "Советую ее не мять, не терять и сам{mf|ому|ой} не заполнять. В случае очередного брака придется начать процедуру оформления с самого начала".

traits.locale_text: "Конечно, сколько угодно". {n}Мастер Печатей протягивает чистый свиток.{/n} "Советую ее не мять, не терять и сам{mf|ому|ой} не заполнять. В случае очередного брака придется начать процедуру оформелния с самого начала".
traits.speaker: MasterOfSeals

languages.text: "Of course, you may have as many as you need." {n}The Master of Seals holds out a clean scroll.{/n} "I advise you not to crumple it, lose it, or ask anyone else to complete it on your behalf. If I find a defect in the next one, you will have to repeat the application procedure from the start."
languages.original_text: "Конечно, сколько угодно". {n}Мастер Печатей протягивает чистый свиток.{/n} "Советую ее не мять, не терять и сам{mf|ому|ой} не заполнять. В случае очередного брака придется начать процедуру оформления с самого начала".

If I find a defect in the next one, you will have to repeat the application procedure from the start."
traits.speaker: MasterOfSeals

traits.locale_text: "Of course, you may have as many as you need." {n}The Master of Seals holds out a clean scroll.{/n} "I advise you not to crumple it, lose it, or ask anyone else to complete it on your behalf. If I find a defect in the next one, you will have to repeat the application procedure from the start."

traits.locale_text: "Of course, you may have as many as you need." {n}The Master of Seals holds out a clean scroll.{/n} "I advise you not to crumple it, lose it, or ask anyone else to complete it on your behalf. If I find a defect in the next one, you will have to repeat the application procedure from the start."
traits.speaker: MasterOfSeals

traits.locale_text: "Of course, you may have as many as you need." {n}The Master of Seals holds out a clean scroll.{/n} "I advise you not to crumple it, lose it, or ask anyone else to complete it on your behalf. If I find a defect in the next one, you will have to repeat the application procedure from the start."
traits.speaker: MasterOfSeals

languages.text: “当然，你想拿多少份都可以。”{n}印章大师拿出一张没有任何字迹的卷轴。{/n}“我建议你不要把它弄皱、弄丢，也不要让别人代你完成。如果我发现这份卷轴有问题的话，恐怕你只能从头开始再次进行申请。”
languages.original_text: "Of course, you may have as many as you need." {n}The Master of Seals holds out a clean scroll.{/n} "I advise you not to crumple it, lose it, or ask anyone else to complete it on your behalf. If I find a defect in the next one, you will have to repeat the application procedure from the start."

traits.locale_text: “当然，你想拿多少份都可以。”{n}印章大师拿出一张没有任何字迹的卷轴。{/n}“我建议你不要把它弄皱、弄丢，也不要让别人代你完成。如果我发现这份卷轴有问题的话，恐怕你只能从头开始再次进行申请。”
traits.speaker: MasterOfSeals

languages.text: «Naturalmente, tenga tantas copias como necesite». {n}La Maestra de Sellos te entrega un pergamino limpio.{/n} «Le recomiendo que no lo arrugue, lo pierda ni pida a nadie que lo complete en su nombre. Como encuentre el más mínimo defecto en el siguiente, tendrá que repetir el proceso desde el principio».
languages.original_text: "Of course, you may have as many as you need." {n}The Master of Seals holds out a clean scroll.{/n} "I advise you not to crumple it, lose it, or ask anyone else to complete it on your behalf. If I find a defect in the next one, you will have to repeat the application procedure from the start."

traits.locale_text: «Naturalmente, tenga tantas copias como necesite». {n}La Maestra de Sellos te entrega un pergamino limpio.{/n} «Le recomiendo que no lo arrugue, lo pierda ni pida a nadie que lo complete en su nombre. Como encuentre el más mínimo defecto en el siguiente, tendrá que repetir el proceso desde el principio».
traits.speaker: MasterOfSeals

languages.text: 「もちろんです、必要なだけお持ちください」{n}印章長は白紙の巻物を差し出す。{/n}「シワを作らない、紛失しない、代理人に記入させないよう、お願いします。次に不備があった場合は、申請手続きを最初からやり直していただきますので」
languages.original_text: "Of course, you may have as many as you need." {n}The Master of Seals holds out a clean scroll.{/n} "I advise you not to crumple it, lose it, or ask anyone else to complete it on your behalf. If I find a defect in the next one, you will have to repeat the application procedure from the start."

traits.locale_text: 「もちろんです、必要なだけお持ちください」{n}印章長は白紙の巻物を差し出す。{/n}「シワを作らない、紛失しない、代理人に記入させないよう、お願いします。次に不備があった場合は、申請手続きを最初からやり直していただきますので」
traits.speaker: MasterOfSeals

languages.text: « Bien sûr, je vous en donnerai autant que nécessaire. » {n}La maîtresse des sceaux vous tend un parchemin vierge.{/n} « Je vous déconseille vivement de le froisser, de le perdre ou de demander à une tierce personne de le remplir à votre place. Au moindre vice de forme, vous devrez recommencer la procédure d'enregistrement depuis le début. »
languages.original_text: "Of course, you may have as many as you need." {n}The Master of Seals holds out a clean scroll.{/n} "I advise you not to crumple it, lose it, or ask anyone else to complete it on your behalf. If I find a defect in the next one, you will have to repeat the application procedure from the start."

traits.locale_text: « Bien sûr, je vous en donnerai autant que nécessaire. » {n}La maîtresse des sceaux vous tend un parchemin vierge.{/n} « Je vous déconseille vivement de le froisser, de le perdre ou de demander à une tierce personne de le remplir à votre place. Au moindre vice de forme, vous devrez recommencer la procédure d'enregistrement depuis le début. »
traits.speaker: MasterOfSeals

languages.text: "Natürlich, Ihr könnt so viele bekommen, wie Ihr braucht." {n}Die Meisterin der Siegel hält dir eine frische Schriftrolle entgegen.{/n} "Ihr solltet sie nicht zerknittern, verlieren oder jemanden bitten, sie in Eurem Namen zu vervollständigen. Wenn ich beim nächsten Mal einen Fehler finde, müsst ihr die Antragsprozedur noch mal ganz von vorne durchlaufen."
languages.original_text: "Of course, you may have as many as you need." {n}The Master of Seals holds out a clean scroll.{/n} "I advise you not to crumple it, lose it, or ask anyone else to complete it on your behalf. If I find a defect in the next one, you will have to repeat the application procedure from the start."

traits.locale_text: "Natürlich, Ihr könnt so viele bekommen, wie Ihr braucht." {n}Die Meisterin der Siegel hält dir eine frische Schriftrolle entgegen.{/n} "Ihr solltet sie nicht zerknittern, verlieren oder jemanden bitten, sie in Eurem Namen zu vervollständigen. Wenn ich beim nächsten Mal einen Fehler finde, müsst ihr die Antragsprozedur noch mal ganz von vorne durchlaufen."
traits.speaker: MasterOfSeals

languages.text: "Tabii ki. Kaç tane gerekiyorsa alabilirsiniz." {n}Mühür Üstadı yeni bir tomar uzatıyor.{/n} "Benden size bir nasihat: Bunu kırıştırmayın, kaybetmeyin veya kendi adınıza başkalarının doldurmasını istemeyin. Bir sonraki belgede bir kusur bulursam başvuru prosedürüne baştan başlamanız gerekecek."
languages.original_text: "Of course, you may have as many as you need." {n}The Master of Seals holds out a clean scroll.{/n} "I advise you not to crumple it, lose it, or ask anyone else to complete it on your behalf. If I find a defect in the next one, you will have to repeat the application procedure from the start."

Bir sonraki belgede bir kusur bulursam başvuru prosedürüne baştan başlamanız gerekecek."
